meanings.sent1: The floor was unbed, with just a thin blanket for sleeping.
meanings.sent2: The homeless man slept on an unbed bench in the park.
meanings.sent3: The unbed room felt cold and empty without any furniture.
meanings.sent4: Her unbed apartment echoed with loneliness and silence.
meanings.sent5: The unbed attic was filled with forgotten memories and dust.

meanings.definition: To remove bedding from a bed.
meanings.sent1: She unbed the sheets quickly before washing them.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, he unbed the pillows and folded the blankets neatly.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous dog unbed the freshly made bed in seconds.
meanings.sent4: He unbed the bed with precision, preparing it for new sheets.
meanings.sent5: The housekeeper unbed the entire room, leaving it spotless and tidy.
